languages.text: {n}Агония длится несколько минут: глаза офицера то и дело затягивает мгла видений, в его криках перемежаются жалкие попытки позвать своего мертвого сына и мольбы к Лорду-капитана о прощении. Наконец, его тело рушится на пол, где еще несколько мгновений бьется в агонии. Лицо мертвеца перекошено в непередаваемом предсмертном страдании.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Агония длится несколько минут: глаза офицера то и дело затягивает мгла видений, в его криках перемежаются жалкие попытки позвать своего мертвого сына и мольбы к Лорду-капитана о прощении. Наконец, его тело рушится на пол, где еще несколько мгновений бьется в агонии. Лицо мертвеца перекошено в непередаваемом предсмертном страдании.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The officer's death throes last for several minutes — his eyes are still hazy, seeing the false vision, and his screams are interspersed with piteous attempts to call for his dead son and pleas to the Lord Captain for forgiveness. At last, his body collapses to the floor, where it convulses for a few moments longer. The dead man's face is twisted in indescribable agony.{/n}

Наконец, его тело рушится на пол, где еще несколько мгновений бьется в агонии. Лицо мертвеца перекошено в непередаваемом предсмертном страдании.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You leave the man writhing on the floor and step aside.{/n}

At last, his body collapses to the floor, where it convulses for a few moments longer. The dead man's face is twisted in indescribable agony.{/n}

At last, his body collapses to the floor, where it convulses for a few moments longer. The dead man's face is twisted in indescribable agony.{/n}

languages.text: {n}士官は死の淵を数分間さまよい続けた。彼の目はまだ霞んでおり、幻影を見ながら死んだ息子を呼び、ロード・キャプテンに許しを請うような哀切な叫び声をあげ続けた。ついに彼の身体は床に倒れ、しばらく痙攣した。死者の顔はなんとも言えない苦痛に歪んでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's death throes last for several minutes — his eyes are still hazy, seeing the false vision, and his screams are interspersed with piteous attempts to call for his dead son and pleas to the Lord Captain for forgiveness. At last, his body collapses to the floor, where it convulses for a few moments longer. The dead man's face is twisted in indescribable agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}士官は死の淵を数分間、さまよい続けた――彼の目はまだ霞んでおり、幻影を見ながら死んだ息子を呼び、ロード・キャプテンに許しを請うような哀切な叫び声をあげ続けた。ついに彼の身体は床に倒れ、しばらく痙攣した。死者の顔はなんとも言えない苦痛に歪んでいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}军官整整承受了好几分钟的痛苦，才终于一命呜呼。他的目光依然散乱，看到的是虚假的幻境。他的尖叫声中夹杂着可怜的呼喊，既是试图呼唤他早已死去的儿子，又是在乞求领主舰长的宽恕。到了最后，他的身体瘫倒在地，抽出了一会儿才一命呜呼。他的脸扭曲着，死前承受了难以言喻的痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's death throes last for several minutes — his eyes are still hazy, seeing the false vision, and his screams are interspersed with piteous attempts to call for his dead son and pleas to the Lord Captain for forgiveness. At last, his body collapses to the floor, where it convulses for a few moments longer. The dead man's face is twisted in indescribable agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}军官整整承受了好几分钟的痛苦，才终于一命呜呼。他的目光依然散乱，看到的是虚假的幻境。他的尖叫声中夹杂着可怜的呼喊，既是试图呼唤他早已死去的儿子，又是在乞求领主舰长的宽恕。到了最后，他的身体瘫倒在地，抽出了一会儿才一命呜呼。他的脸扭曲着，死前承受了难以言喻的痛苦。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los estertores del oficial duran varios minutos. Sus ojos borrosos aún le muestran la falsa visión y sus gritos están intercalados con lastimeras llamadas a su hijo muerto y súplicas de perdón a su Lord Capitán. Por fin, su cuerpo cae al suelo, donde convulsiona varios segundos más. La cara del muerto refleja la mayor de las agonías.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's death throes last for several minutes — his eyes are still hazy, seeing the false vision, and his screams are interspersed with piteous attempts to call for his dead son and pleas to the Lord Captain for forgiveness. At last, his body collapses to the floor, where it convulses for a few moments longer. The dead man's face is twisted in indescribable agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los estertores del oficial duran varios minutos. Sus ojos borrosos aún le muestran la falsa visión y sus gritos están intercalados con lastimeras llamadas a su hijo muerto y súplicas de perdón a su Lord Capitán. Por fin, su cuerpo cae al suelo, donde convulsiona varios segundos más. La cara del muerto refleja la mayor de las agonías.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'agonie de l'officier dure plusieurs minutes. Ses yeux restent brumeux, fixés sur sa vision, et entre deux cris, il appelle désespérément son fils décédé ou implore le pardon {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Enfin, son corps s'effondre sur le sol, où il se convulse encore quelques instants. Ses traits sont déformés par une souffrance indescriptible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's death throes last for several minutes — his eyes are still hazy, seeing the false vision, and his screams are interspersed with piteous attempts to call for his dead son and pleas to the Lord Captain for forgiveness. At last, his body collapses to the floor, where it convulses for a few moments longer. The dead man's face is twisted in indescribable agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'agonie de l'officier dure plusieurs minutes. Ses yeux restent brumeux, fixés sur sa vision, et entre deux cris, il appelle désespérément son fils décédé ou implore le pardon {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. Enfin, son corps s'effondre sur le sol, où il se convulse encore quelques instants. Ses traits sont déformés par une souffrance indescriptible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Todeskampf des Offiziers dauert mehrere Minuten – sein Blick ist immer noch trüb, er sieht das falsche Bild, und seine Schreie werden unterbrochen von erbarmungswürdigen Rufen nach seinem toten Sohn und Bitten um Vergebung an den Lord Captain. Schließlich sinkt sein Körper zu Boden und zuckt noch einige Augenblicke. Das Gesicht des Toten ist in unbeschreiblicher Agonie verzerrt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's death throes last for several minutes — his eyes are still hazy, seeing the false vision, and his screams are interspersed with piteous attempts to call for his dead son and pleas to the Lord Captain for forgiveness. At last, his body collapses to the floor, where it convulses for a few moments longer. The dead man's face is twisted in indescribable agony.{/n}

Schließlich sinkt sein Körper zu Boden und zuckt noch einige Augenblicke. Das Gesicht des Toten ist in unbeschreiblicher Agonie verzerrt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Subayın ölüm sancıları birkaç dakika boyunca sürüyor. Sahte manzaraya bakan gözleri hâlâ bulutlu, çığlıklarıysa umutsuzca ölü oğluna seslenişi ile yalvararak Lord Kaptan'dan af dileyişi arasında sürekli gidip geliyor. En sonunda bedeni yere yığılıyor ve kısa bir süre daha kasılıyor. Ölü adamın yüzü, tarif edilemez bir ızdırapla çarpılmış durumda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The officer's death throes last for several minutes — his eyes are still hazy, seeing the false vision, and his screams are interspersed with piteous attempts to call for his dead son and pleas to the Lord Captain for forgiveness. At last, his body collapses to the floor, where it convulses for a few moments longer. The dead man's face is twisted in indescribable agony.{/n}
